feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 11:52PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ELEVATED SURF FROM POINT HOPE TO THE BERING STRAIT THROUGH MONDAY... Northwest winds 15 to 30 mph are expected through Monday along the coast south of Point Hope to the Bering Strait, causing elevated surf with minor beach erosion for north facing coastlines.

These factors could lead to isolated flash flooding issues. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be
entry.cap:areaDesc: South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills

entry.title: Flood Watch issued August 14 at 3:23AM MDT until August 14 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS
